General.Name: Lutronic Corporation
General.Description: Lutronic Corporation manufactures and sells aesthetic and medical advanced laser, and related technology worldwide. The company provides HOLLYWOOD SPECTRA, a laser platform with proprietary capabilities to reduce unwanted pigmentation and restore glowing skin; Accufit that delivers direct muscle activation treatments for an improved aesthetic appearance; LUTRONIC GENIUS, which delivers precision in every pulse; CLARITY II, a dual wavelength platform laser with breakthrough intelligent capabilities; LaseMD Ultra that provides customized outcomes with virtually no downtime for patients; and SPECTRA XT, a cutting-edge device. It also offers CLARITY, a dual-wavelength platform that enables treatment versatility and greater speed; LASEMD, an extendable platform that is able to provide a cosmeceutical delivery system program for skincare and cure; SPECTRA that provides low-downtime and efficacious treatments; PICOPLUS for the treatment of melasma; and ACTION II, a specialized multiple stacking fractional technology that combines user-selected ablation depth with coagulation control for a virtually painless procedure. In addition, the company provides eCO2, a premier fractional ablative CO2 laser; INFINI, a unique technology based on fractional delivery of RF energy with insulated microneedles; HEALITE II that provides therapeutic use of incident light to photo modulate cellular function; and SOLARI, an IPL system. Further, it offers TotalSkin Solution to treat all layers of the skin in a comprehensive way to satisfy your patients' expectations; KeraFactor Peptide Complex, a hair and scalp treatment; and Hollywood Laser Peel, a fast and comfortable treatment by the Lutronic Spectra laser platform. The company was formerly known as Max Engineering Ltd. and changed its name to Lutronic Corporation in 2006. Lutronic Corporation was founded in 1997 and is based in Goyang, South Korea.
